QuestData.Title: The Secrets of Gorgrond
QuestData.Description: Our victory today was costly. Too costly. There is no guarantee that we can turn another attack.$b$bWe need to know what the Iron Horde is up to, and there is only one place we can go to find out.$b$bGorgrond.$b$bIt is a savage land that few ever return from.$b$bI mean to go there, I mean to find their stronghold at Blackrock, and I mean to learn how we can defeat these vile orcs.$b$bWill you join me, Commander?
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek Yrel at the Wildwood Wash in Gorgrond. Speak with your Garrison Gryphon Master to fly there.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Dungar Longdrink to fly to Gorgrond
